title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama, enabling easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, installable via npm.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI client for Ollama, supports code highlighting, model management, and multi-user auth.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, allowing use of local Ollama models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client library for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and image support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama’s REST API, supports streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper around Ollama with prompt templates and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for code completion.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama, enabling local LLMs in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and strongly-typed models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker Compose stack for Ollama with Open WebUI, GPU pass-through, and persistent volumes.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Electron desktop GUI for Ollama with chat history and model switching.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama with async client and streaming support.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app that exposes Ollama models via REST endpoints with JWT auth and rate limits.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that proxies Ollama with OpenAI-compatible endpoints and token counting.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with thread support and model selection via emojis.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI autocomplete and summarization using local Ollama models.
